summary: Adds 4 Stand Alone Followers : 2 males and 2 Females (UNP) with unique face models in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[center] [youtube]_1qPZ_3pyWI[/youtube] [/center]





[size=7][color=#FF0000]HS Followers : [/color] [color=#0000FF] 4 New Stand Alone Followers[/color][/size]


[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12681711675/][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7344/12681711675_aaa6f29a51_c.jpg[/img][/url]


[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12679912734/][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5514/12679912734_5f4b2058ba_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#FFFF00]HSFollowers is a completely new project [/color] [color=#ffff00]with a new[/color] [color=#FF0000][b]STAND-ALONE[/b][/color] [color=#ffff00]follower mod so :[/color]
[LIST=1]
[*] [/*]

[*][color=#ffd700][size=5]You don't need anything to get this mod working![/size][/color][/*]
[/LIST]
[color=#ffd700][size=5]Now here are the characters you will encounter :[/size][/color]


[center][size=8][font=georgia, serif][color=#008000][b]AVERSA[/b][/color][/font][/size][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][font=georgia, serif][size=7][color=#008000][b][url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12678734355/][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5548/12678734355_885bb48cb0_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[/center]
[center] [/center]

[center] [/center]
[center][b][font='lucida grande', sans-serif][size=8][color=#ffff00]EPHIDEL[/color][/size][/font][/b][/center]
[center][url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12678890103/][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5503/12678890103_285e915cd2_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][b][color=#00ffff][size=8][font=times, serif]KAREL[/font][/size][/color][/b][/center]
[center][url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12679220064/][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3768/12679220064_7c7f855460_c.jpg[/img][/url] [/center]

[center][font=georgia, serif][size=8][b][color=#b22222]NOAHLIN[/color][/b][/size][/font][/center]
[center] [url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12678743885/][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3689/12678743885_be8bb40bc9_c.jpg[/img][/url] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[font=arial, helvetica, sans-serif][size=6][color=#ffff00]You will find them all in the [/color][b][color=#ff0000]DRUNKEN HUNTSMAN [/color][/b][/size][/font][size=5][font=arial, helvetica, sans-serif][color=#ffff00] in Whiterun.[/color][/font][/size]


[center] [/center]
[center] [url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12679912114/][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7354/12679912114_9556acf5f3_c.jpg[/img][/url] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[size=5]To install the mod manually correctly once you download it :[/size]
[LIST=1]
[*] [/*]
[*]Unzip the file "Data" In [color=#0000ff]C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonSkyrim[/color][color=#ffffff].[/color]
[/*]
[*]Click yes when asked if you are sure to replace files.
[/*]
[*]Be sure that the four of the mods are checked
[/*]
[*]Play the Game and Enjoy HSFollowers : 2nd Generation[/*]
[/LIST]
[center] [url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12679574953/][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7397/12679574953_fee64e3a2b_c.jpg[/img][/url] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[size=5][color=#008000]There is nothing optional for the moment, but be sure to check the updates of the mod!Sorry, and Thank you for your patience.[/color][/size]


[center] [url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12679574183/][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7374/12679574183_a61b409b9a_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[color=#40e0d0]Q : Karel and Ephidel looks a little older than I excepted, why?[/color]
[color=#f0f8ff]A : I used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures by Urshi to do so[/url] , I didn't add it to the core file ( HSfollowers) because of the weight of the textures.[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Will it have a ADEC,CBBE,UNBP etc. version of this mod?[/color]
[color=#ffffff]A : I am sorry but no. :/[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Okay... but Is it at least working with CBBE?[/color]
[color=#f0ffff]A : Of course : It's stand alone. c:[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Can I publish/Will you make a nude version of this mod?[/color]
[color=#fff0f5]A : I don't really encourage the nudity, so, sorry, but no. :/[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : The armors you show on your mod are so awesome, Where can I get that? :D[/color]
[color=#fff0f5]A : Indeed they are awesome armors! Don't worry I'll put every other armor on the credits and recommandations! :)[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : I got'em... but their equipments... meh, it kinda sucks, how do I change that? :c[/color]
[color=#ffffff]A : Just download [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]ATF[/url] and it will be cool :)

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Where the fehk do I find them?[/color]
[color=#fff0f5]A : In the Whiterun's Drunken Huntman![/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Where the fehk are they, I lost'em![/color]
[color=#fff0f5]A : No problem, if you lost them you can do that : Player.moveto "IDofHSfollower" without quotes ( IDofHSfollower = the Id of the follower)[/color]
[color=#fff0f5]But you don't know the ID of the NPC? Well simple enough type help "nameofthefollower" and the id will be shown![/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : They're not in the Drunken Huntsman ![/color]
[color=#ffffff]A : So there : make sure you installed The latest version of skyrim (1.9.32.0) and the latest version of SKSE[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : It doesn't work! How can I contact you quickly to play this mod?[/color]
[color=#fff0f5]A : Don't worry, you'll just have to mail my Account! Or just posting in the post section of the mod![/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Cool, but can I marry one of them?[/color]
[color=#f0ffff]A : Yes, you of course can. :smile:[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : The ENB is beautiful, what are you using?[/color]
[color=#f0ffff]A : I am using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37716/?]Somber ENB[/url][/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : When will the optional files be realeased?[/color]
[color=#f0f8ff]A : I am working on it right now! So it'll be soon ready, be patient meanwhile. :smile:[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Is it anime like?[/color]
[color=#f0f8ff]A : No it's not, I just wanted followers that looked younger that the vanilla version of skyrim, I can understand why some people are arguing with it, but I don't want to impose my mod as a reference to the immersion, or any kind of these[/color]

[color=#40e0d0]Q : Cheesecake?[/color]
[color=#f0f8ff]A : Cheesecake.[/color]




[center][url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12679437205/][img]https://farm3.staticflickr.com/2874/12679437205_e770bfe749_c.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[center] [/center]
[font=cursive][size=5]CREDITS FOR THE MOD :[/size][/font]

[size=4][font=cursive][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Caracter Edit by tktk( I really recommend it BTW)[/url][/font][/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url][/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D3589%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Natural Eyes by nevenbridge81[/url][/size]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D13722&pUp=1]The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam[/url][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?] UNP SFW Models by Dimonized[/url]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female textures by Hellosanta[/url][/size]
Geonox Face textures

[size=5]RECOMMENDATIONS[/size] :

For each character :


[size=5][color=#00ff00]Aversa :[/color][/size]
[LIST=1]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4708/?]Triss Armor Retexture by Psyke[/url]
[/*]
[*]Become a bard ([url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=200602183]Only on steam )[/url]
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23876/?]Crossbow basic collection by DJjojo[/url][/*]
[/LIST]
[color=#ffd700][size=5]Ephidel :[/size][/color]
[LIST=1]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/?]Arise - Black Sacrament Armor by AmethystDeceiver[/url]
[/*]
[*][color=#f0f8ff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures by Urshi to do so[/url][/color][/*]
[/LIST]
[size=5][color=#00ffff]Karel :[/color][/size]
[LIST=1]
[color=#00ffff][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3413/?]Midas Magic Spells by Midas[/url][/size][/color]
[/*]
[color=#00ffff][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive weapons by hothtrooper44[/url][/size][/color]
[/LIST]
[color=#b22222][size=5]Noahlin :[/size][/color]
[LIST=1]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36780/?]West Wind Combat Misfit Mage by brokefoot[/url]
[/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31191/?]Mage Backpack by tumbajumba[/url][/*]
[/LIST]

[size=5]Also thanks to Brotherbob, Natilde,UltimateUnit34 and Bethesda![/size]



Here we are enjoy!


[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/113673354@N04/12697332545/][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7344/12697332545_762def6df9_c.jpg[/img][/url]
